sentences.en: Elect according to the foreknowledge of God the Father, through sanctification of the Spirit, unto obedience and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ: Grace unto you, and peace, be multiplied.
sentences.cn: 就是照父神的先见被拣选，藉着圣灵得成圣洁，以致顺服耶稣基督，又蒙他血所洒的人。 愿恩惠平安，多多的加给你们。

sentences.en: Electric charge may be detected qualitatively by sprinkling or blowing indicating powders.
sentences.cn: 静电荷可以用撒布指示粉剂的方法,予以探测.

sentences.en: Finish by sprinkling some chopped almonds over the cake.
sentences.cn: 最后在蛋糕上撒些剁碎的杏仁.

sentences.en: Hurry up! It is sprinkling now.
sentences.cn: 快点! 天已掉雨点了.

sentences.en: It was composed of ex - motormen and conductors in part, with a sprinkling of friends and sympathisers.
sentences.cn: 这些人有一部分是原来的司机和售票员, 还有一些是他们的朋友和同情者.

sentences.en: Moreover, the sprinkling water on the surface affects the pre - cooling process undoubtedly.
sentences.cn: 另外, 蔬菜表面洒水对食品预冷过程有较大的影响.

sentences.en: Norway has a fair sprinkling of women ministers.
On the side of a hill a sprinkling of leaves.
Scientists thought that most RNA in a cell was messenger RNA generated by protein-coding genes, RNA in ribosomes, or a sprinkling of other RNA elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 大多数科学家认为，RNA在细胞的信使RNA的蛋白编码基因的核糖体，核糖核酸，或其他RNA洒在其他地方产生的。

sentences.en: She had a wonderful clear skin with an attractive sprinkling of freckles.
sentences.cn: 她光滑的皮肤上有几处可爱的小雀斑.

sentences.en: She is sprinkling water on the dusty path.
sentences.cn: 她正在给满地灰尘的小路上洒水.

sentences.en: She made a big performance of sprinkling all the spices on.
sentences.cn: 她费了不少劲才把所有的香料都撒在上面。

sentences.en: Sporadic laughter is a sprinkling of dope that fills the air.
sentences.cn: 相互间零星的笑谈,似是空气中微洒的兴奋剂.

sentences.en: Sprinklers are sprinkling water on the street each day.
sentences.cn: 牧师赐给婴儿名字时,往它身上撒了圣水.

sentences.en: The cleaners were sprinkling water on the floor and sweeping up the cigarette - ends.
sentences.cn: 茶房打扫地下的香烟头,洒了许多水.

sentences.en: The micro - nozzle can be used for sprinkling in yard or small garden.
sentences.cn: 另有微型喷头可用于庭院或小面积园圃洒浇灌之用.

sentences.en: Through faith he kept the passover, and the sprinkling of blood, lest he that destroyed the firstborn should touch them.
sentences.cn: 他因着信，就守逾越节，（守或作立）行洒血的礼，免得那灭长子的临近以色列人。
